caption:
The photograph depicts an elderly man engaged in the process of preparing animal pelts. The man is dressed in a white apron over casual attire and wears glasses and a red cap. He holds a knife in one hand and appears to be working on a pelt on a rustic wooden table supported by a barrel with diagonal white and black stripes.

The background includes a variety of animal pelts and tails hanging vertically, showcasing various patterns and shades, primarily black and gray. The setting suggests a workshop environment, possibly within a covered area as natural light appears to filter in from the surroundings. Shadows and a muted ambiance hint at a space dedicated to craft or manual work related to hunting or pelt preparation. The composition skillfully captures a traditional and possibly vanishing craft, emphasizing the artisan's expertise and the raw materials of his trade.
title: Fur skins of fox, raccoon and bobcat being prepared for market in Leakey, Texas, near San Antonio
